text:
Karius | Software Engineer, DevOps | Full time | Redwood City, CA | ONSITE | Full-time

Karius invented an infectious disease test that sequences all the DNA in a normal blood draw to tell a physician what the patient is infected with. We are well-funded and receiving orders.

We are hiring backend, fronted, pipeline, and devops engineers.
